com.stl.skipthelibrary.Helpers

Class BookDescriptionReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      • com.stl.skipthelibrary.Helpers.BookDescriptionReceiver

  • public class BookDescriptionReceiver
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
    This class is used to get the books description, it works with the BookWebAPIHelper
